Title: Introduction and what you'll need for readiness to engage

Pages.Title: Readiness to engage
Pages.BodyText:
For this section, you'll need to know how your organisation will:

  • engage with employers and subcontractors
  • manage its relationship with employers and subcontractors
  • assess prior learning, including English and maths qualifications
  • deliver and assess English and maths

You'll also need to upload your organisation's:

  • complaints policy
  • contract for services template with employers
!WarningAll policies and processes must be specific to your organisation, apprentices and trainers. They must also be signed by a senior employee. For example, a director or CEO. We will not accept policies or processes that are generic or taken from a third party.
